title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin looks at the Nets win over the Cavaliers to officially lock up the 7 seed in the East and why they are a real threat in the playoffs. He praises the Raiders for extending QB Derek Carr and why they are one of 12 teams who are in contention to win a Super Bowl next season. He also points out which NFL team is clearly better run than other teams and it's painfully obvious. Plus, Ryen Russillo from The Ringer joins the show to breakdown the NBA playoffs. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
